Name: Burnit Quest
About the game: To play Burnit Quest you must first download the Fit Controller app on your phone! A Mobile-Enhanced Fitness Platformer for 1 to 2 Players! An immersive fitness experience In Burnit Quest you will use your controller's movement to transfer actual exercise data. Making up for a fun and engaging fitness experience! Couch co-op and versus modes Working out with friends is always better! Grab a friend and get ready to work out in good company in the co-op campaign . Or face each other in the various versus modes , and find out who is the mightiest! 40 unique stages Explore Pok island in 8 different environments that, and face all kinds of challenges that require different types of exercise to beat! Underwater stages: Swim by doing jumping jacks.. Platforming stages: Move by running, attack with punches and squat to perform jumps! Slingshot stages: Use sit ups to operate a giant slingshot Fishing mini game: Squat to throw the line and lure the fish! 8 terrifying bosses Face fierce enemies each with their unique pattern and weakness. Are you fit enough to beat them? Skills to master Get in shape in life and in the game. Improve your speed, attack and more by investing in up to 22 different skills! Exercise log This exergame tracks of your fitness progress, high scores, current and previous session in order to keep you motivated to improve!
